overview: A dark comedy short about the clichés of the sexes. Tormented by his ever-babbling girlfriend, the protagonist escapes into a fantasy world. Unfortunately, his colorful dream isn't HALF as wonderful as he had imagined.  The film had its world premiere at the International Short Film Festival Dresden, Germany and made its way through several festivals around the globe.

production_companies.name: Hochschule für Film und Fernsehen 'Konrad Wolf'
